functional_jobs.job: Identify and evaluate emerging technologies for potential adoption
Build business cases that convince leadership to invest in innovation
Manage innovation portfolio to balance risk and return
Translate technical innovation into business value

emotional_jobs.job: Feel confident presenting innovation strategy to the board
Be seen as a strategic leader, not just a technology manager
Reduce anxiety about missing important technology trends

social_jobs.job: Be recognized as an innovation thought leader in the industry
Build credibility with peers and executives

pain_points.pain: Limited budget for experimentation despite high expectations
evidence_quotes: We're expected to innovate but every dollar has to show ROI immediately
My budget got cut 20% but my targets stayed the same

pain_points.pain: Difficulty getting leadership buy-in for longer-term innovations
evidence_quotes: The board wants quarterly results, not 3-year transformation stories
I can't get anyone to commit to something that won't pay off for 18 months

pain_points.pain: Lack of systematic framework for evaluating innovation opportunities
evidence_quotes: Every evaluation feels like we're reinventing the wheel
We don't have a consistent way to compare very different types of innovations

pain_points.pain: Resistance to change from operational teams
evidence_quotes: The operations team sees us as troublemakers who create more work
Getting pilot programs adopted into production is like pulling teeth

gains_desired.gain: Credible methodology to prioritize innovation investments
Data-driven evidence to support innovation business cases
Framework that balances short-term wins with long-term transformation
Ability to demonstrate innovation impact in language leadership understands

current_alternatives.limitations: Too generic, expensive, don't understand our specific context
Inconsistent, time-consuming, lacks credibility with leadership
Good for awareness but don't help with specific prioritization decisions

decision_criteria.criterion: Ability to build internal capability over time

high_resonance_messages: Balance portfolio risk across time horizons
low_resonance_messages: Move fast and break things philosophy
